202231.「いいだろう！\n 何について 聞きたいんだ？\n<select>\nバトエン大:
Great! Which should I explain?
<select>
About Tournaments
About Rules
Rank Up Prizes
Top Ranking Rewards
About Event Period
About Time Limit
Who are you?
<select_end><break>

202232.「……と思ったら 持ち物がいっぱいのようだぞ！\n <%sBAGTYPE>に空き:
...I think you've got too much stuff! Clear
out your <%sBAGTYPE> and then
come see me again!

202233.「わかった しばし待とう。\n 準備ができたら レッツバトエンファイトだ！:
Gotcha. I'll wait for ya. When you're ready,
LET'S BATOEN FIGHT!

202234.「今は 先日まで行われていたバトエン大会の\n 結果発表を 行っているぞ！\n:
Right now we're announcing the results of this
most recent tournament. So what'll it be?
<select>
View Rankings
View Rewards
Explanation
<select_end><break>

202235.「今は前半戦。デッキを持ってなくても参加できる\n タクティカルピックルールの大:
This is the tournament's first half. Right now
we're using the Tactical Pick Rules, so you
don't even need a deck! So what'll it be?
<select>
Participate
View Rankings
View Rewards
Explanation
<select_end><break>

202236.「やあ！ オレの名前は バトエンジャー！\n 蒼きバトエンのオーラに 突き動かさ:
Hey! My name's Batoenger! Driven by the Blue Batoen's power, I came here to hold the Batoen Tournament!
That's right... this exciting tournament has two halves: Tactical Pick Rules for the first, and My Deck rules for the second.
The first half's Tactical Pick Battle lets you pick 3 Batoen from a random pool of 12 for a more limited type battle!
Before choosing your pencils, you can pick one you don't want your opponents using! But be careful, your opponents can do the same!
The second half's My Deck Battle lets you use your own pencils to battle!
Each half has their own different tournament score, so try to score the best you can in both to reach the top of the ranks!
If multiple players hit the same score, whoever got the score first will be the one to get the higher rank!
I can sense your fired up spirit... that's what I like to see! Now get out there, and give it your all in every Batoen Fight!
In this tournament as well, there'll be separate rank up prizes for each half!
I hope you'll try out the new rules and have some amazing fights!

202237.「では レッツ バトエンファイト！\n 健闘を 祈っているぞ！:
Then... LET'S BATOEN FIGHT! Good luck out
there!

202238.「今は 次のマイデッキルールの大会を準備中だ。\n 開催まで もう少し待っててく:
Right now, I'm preparing the My Deck Rules
part of the tournament. Please wait a bit
longer! So what'll it be?
<select>
View Rankings
View Rewards
Explanation
<select_end><break>

202239.「今は後半戦。自分のデッキで試合をする\n マイデッキルールの大会を 開催中だぞ:
This is the tournament's second half. Right
now we're using the My Deck Rules, so you can
use your own deck! So what'll it be?
<select>
Participate
View Rankings
View Rewards
Explanation
<select_end><break>

202240.「すごいぞ！ 後半戦のマイデッキルールで\n １０００位内に入っているじゃないか:
Awesome!! You placed in the Top 1000 for the
My Deck Rules half of the tournament! This
is for you!

202241.「やあ！ オレの名前は バトエンジャー！\n 蒼きバトエンのオーラに 突き動かさ:
Yo! My name's Batoenger! Driven by the Blue Batoen's power, I came here to hold the Batoen Tournament!
Seems like you've never heard of Batoen before... Trust me, once you try it, you'll definitely want to participate here!
There's no doubt in my mind... you've got it in you. If you wanna start, go talk to Rejes in the inn. Then we can fight together!

202242.「バトエン大会は 期間限定で行われる大会だ！\n 勝利することで 大会スコアを稼:
This Batoen Tournament is a limited time event! You gotta win to raise your tournament score!
The higher your score, the higher your ranking'll be.
However, losing at high ranks will mean your score goes down, so be careful.
Got all that? Well then, fight fair and aim for the highest rank!

202243.「バトエン大会は 前半戦と後半戦で\n 別々のルールに なっているんだ。\n<b:
The Batoen tournament has separate rules for the first half and the second half. The first half is the Takuti Carpick Battle! This is a
restricted battle in which players are allowed to choose 3 of the 12 envelopes at the start of the match! Before choosing 3 envelopes,
players may choose one they do not want their opponent to use and seal it. You cannot use an opponent's sealed pencil! There is a unique
deck bonus in the first half of the game! That's right, you get a bonus if you get a score with a Batoen that other players did not
choose! If you use a Batoen that is not being used properly, you can get a little discount. Try it out! The second half of the game is "My
Deck Battle"! In this battle, you fight with your own Enpaku and other pens! In the rules of the tournament, the maximum number of turns
for cry turns has been changed from 10 to 8, so please be aware of this when you build your deck! In addition, the tempo of the game has
been speeded up by simplifying the skill direction for the tournament only, so feel free to try it!

202244.「もし 戦いの中で 大会スコアを増やし\n ランクアップしたら 君の栄誉を祝し\:
If you increase your tournament score and rank up during the battle, we will celebrate your honor and give you a commemorative gift! There
are different rank-up prizes for each rule, so you can try out either rule. If you have collected enough Batoen points in the first
half of the tournament, you may want to build your own deck and participate in the second half of the tournament.

202245.「バトエン大会は ランクアップしたとき\n もらえる記念品の他に\n ランキング:
In addition to the commemorative gifts that you receive when you advance in rank in the Batoen Tournament, there is also a top-ranking
reward for the Run King. The top-ranking reward is only given to those who finish in the top 1000 ranks! For more details, please
see the Reward List. If there are multiple players with the same score in each Run King, the first one to reach that score will be
ranked higher. Of course, the top 1000 players in both the first half and the second half of the competition will receive both rewards!

202246.<pc>は <%sTYPE>の\n<%nRANKING>位のランキング上位報酬と:
<pc> received <%sITEM> for
achieving a Top Rank of <%dRANKING> in
<%sTYPE>!<se_nots System 7>

202247.「どのランキングを 確認するんだ？\n<select>\nタクティカルピック\n:
Which rankings do you wanna check?
<select>
Tactical Pick
My Deck
<select_end><close>

202248.「やあ！ 待っていたぞ！\n 君の中に眠る 熱きバトエンのオーラが \n さけん:
Yo! Been waiting for you! I can feel your
burning desire calling out to me... You
want to Batoen Fight!

202249.「どの報酬を 確認するんだ？\n ルール別に ランクアップ記念品があるから\n:
Which rewards do you wanna check? Both rules
have their own rewards, so make sure to check
'em both.
<select>
Rank Up Rewards
Top Ranking Rewards
<select_end><close>

202250.<pc>は <%sTYPE>の\n<%sCLASS>ランクの記念品として\n<%:
<pc> received <%sITEM> for
achieving Rank <%sCLASS>
in <%sTYPE>!<se_nots System 7>

202251.「おおっ！ 前回の試合でランクアップしたな！\n おめでとう！ それでは君に 栄:
Oooh! You've ranked up since your last battle! Congrats! I'll give you this proof of honor... and this rank up reward, too!
Each rule has its own rank up prizes, so make sure to try both! Well then... keep fighting the good fight!

202252.「では さっそく始めようじゃないか！\n この試合では 自分のデッキで闘うことに:
Well then, are ya ready to start? You'll play
with your own deck, so make sure you've
got it ready.
<select>
I'm ready!
Wait a second!
<select_end><break>

202253.「では さっそく始めようじゃないか！\n この試合は開始時に配られる えんぴつを:
Well then, are ya ready to start? You'll be
given pencils at the start of the game and
can build a deck with those. You ready?
<select>
I'm ready!
Wait a second!
<select_end><break>

202254.「今後も 熱きバトエンファイトに\n はげんでくれよな！: Keep up the excellent Batoen Fights!

202255.「やるな！ 前半戦のタクティカルピックルールで\n １０００位内に入っているじゃ:
You did it! You placed in the Top 1000 for the
Tactical Pick Rules half of the tournament!
Take this, you've earned it!

203090.「バトエン大会は 前半戦と後半戦に別れていて\n 前半戦は <%nMM_1>月<:
The Batoen Tournament is divided into two halves. The first half starts on <%dMM_1>/<%dDD_1> <%dHH_1>:<%dmm_1> JST and ends on <%dMM_2>/<%dDD_2> <%dHH_2>:<%dmm_2> JST.
After an intermission period, the second half starts on <%dMM_3>/<%dDD_3> <%dHH_3>:<%dmm_3> JST and ends on <%dMM_4>/<%dDD_4> <%dHH_4>:<%dmm_4> JST.
You won't be able to receive any rewards or check your score until <%dMM_5>/<%dDD_5> <%dHH_5>:<%dmm_5> JST!

203091.「バトエン大会では １回の行動選択に\n １５秒の制限時間がある。\n 決断力が:
In Batoen competitions, there is a 15-second time limit per action choice. The decisiveness of your decision will determine the winner. If
you exceed the time limit twice in a row, you will be disqualified from the match and ejected from the competition!

203703.「おっと！\n バトエン大会は ひとりで 参加するものだ！\n パーティを解散し:
Whoops! You're on your own in this tournament!
Gotta disband your party first!

203711.「ヒーローにも しばしの休息は 必要……。\n 今は バトエン大会は開催していな:
Whew, even heroes need a break... there isn't
a tournament being held right now. Come back
when it starts!

205731.「……と思ったら ゴールドがいっぱいだぞ！\n ゴールドを預かり所に預けてから:
...I think your wallet is full! Put some of
that Gold away, then come see me again!

205742.「フ……。ヒーローというものは 自らについて\n 語る言葉を持たない……。唯一:
Whew... there's not much a hero can say about himself. What I can say, though, is that where there's Batoen, I'll always be there!
I'm looking forward to seeing you fired up in the Batoen Tournament!

<%sTYPE>!

252698.「おおっ！ 前回の試合でランクアップしたな！\n おめでとう！ それでは君に 栄:
Oooh! You've ranked up since your last battle! Congrats! I'll give you this proof of honor... and this rank up reward, too!
Keep fighting the good fight!

252699.「今は 後半戦のランクアップ記念品が\n 受け取れるぞ。\n それじゃ どの報酬:
